heroHeadline: A compass, not a surveillance tool
heroSubheadline: Pulse Check gives engineering leaders real-time visibility into team health across 200+ engineers — through transparency, not tracking.
problemStatement: At scale, gut feel breaks down. With 200+ engineers across dozens of client projects, leaders rely on ad-hoc feedback, quarterly reviews, and hallway conversations. By the time a problem surfaces, it's already costing the team.

pillars.title: Client Satisfaction
pillars.description: Bi-weekly pulse surveys capture NPS and CSAT scores directly from clients, providing real-time sentiment without waiting for quarterly reviews.

pillars.title: Team Feedback
pillars.description: Lightweight lead check-ins replace subjective gut feel with structured status tags and evidence-backed notes.

pillars.title: Growth
pillars.description: Engineer self-assessments track skill development, level progression, and growth trajectory with linked evidence.

pillars.title: Delivery
pillars.description: Automated metrics from GitHub and Jira surface PR cycle time, deploy frequency, and investment mix without manual reporting.

transparencyDescription: Every metric tracked in Pulse Check is visible to the engineer it measures. No hidden scores, no behind-the-back evaluations. Engineers see exactly what their managers see — because growth requires trust, not monitoring.

personas.title: Engineer
personas.description: See your own Composite Pulse Score and understand exactly how you're being evaluated. Track your growth, celebrate wins, and address gaps before they become problems.
capabilities: View personal scorecard with all 4 pillars

personas.title: Lead / PM
personas.description: Submit structured check-ins for your team members. Flag blockers early, track follow-up actions, and replace ad-hoc feedback with consistent signals.
capabilities: Submit lead check-ins with status tags

personas.title: Partner / Leadership
personas.description: Get a bird's-eye view of the entire engineering roster. Spot declining trends, prioritize attention, and adjust pillar weighting to match organizational priorities.
capabilities: Filter by project, level, and trend
Adjust pillar weights with live recalculation

testimonials.quote: We went from quarterly surprises to bi-weekly clarity. Pulse Check turned our gut feel into a signal system.
testimonials.author: Maria Chen

testimonials.quote: Knowing my engineers can see the same scores I see completely changed how I give feedback. It's a conversation starter, not a judgment.
testimonials.author: David Okafor
